Name: Hammer time!
About the game: It's ”Hammer Time!” – hardcore platformer with puzzle elements. Use your hammer and puzzle solving skills to complete levels. You play as a young demigod who wants to get home. But the way is super difficult... It's a real trial! Game Features: Smash chickens! Using the hammer Jump up to the sky! Using the hammer Find the secrets! Using the hammer Use hammer! Using your brain Only real hardcore players are able to beat all levels. Test yourself!
